title: how do i get the poro pet asap
body:
i hate nexus blitz. 
i hate it, but im so desperate to get the poro pet so im playing it. 
how do i complete the missions faster
edit: oh yeah next time can you make the poro pet achievable by not just playing nexus blitz

replies.body:
The poro pet is exclusive to nexus blitz and ARAM, and it doesn't look like you play ARAM so why do you want it so badly? All it is for you is an icon.

Regardless, the fastest way is just to remember what missions you have and make sure you're doing them. E.g if you have the battle sled mission make sure you're using the sled when you leave base.

basically i like any poro related icon (although i dont use them a lot since im flexing with my only mythic icon) and i dont play aram a lot but i do sometimes when im messing around with friendos

Fair enough. Unfortunately, like I said, there's no real strat to get them faster, other than making sure you're completing the conditions as often as possible. I got it basically by accident, but I've also been enjoying and play Nexus Blitz so you're in a bit of a tough spot with that one.
So there's no point in getting it. Waste of your time. It's also disappearing in like 2 weeks.
